import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { TranslateService } from '@ngx-translate/core'; import { ServiceProvider } from 'src/app/shared/service-provider.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.scss'] }) export class ContactComponent { aboutMeModel: any = {}; constructor( private serviceProvider: ServiceProvider, private router: Router, public translate: TranslateService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.readAboutMe(); } readAboutMe() { this.serviceProvider .post('aboutUs/read', {}) .subscribe((data) => { let model: any = {}; model = data; this.aboutMeModel = model.objectData[0]; }); } }
